title: queued for ranked and got placed in a normals game.
body:
wat

Edit: Just happened again, i dodged this time, whats going on?

replies.body: ive had twice, queue for normal with 4-5 people...get into game...its bots...

Lmao bots, that just weird, this needs to be fixed because i was unable to play ranked on this account today, its a problem, happened twice in a row so i just said screw it i'm going on my smurf cause i didn't wanna play normals.

Similar thing happened to me twice, queued for norms and got ranked

{{champion:39}}

Ok so its not just me then, this happened to me and my friend a few months ago too, i tried making a thread on reddit since its a bigger community over there and all i got was assholes giving me %%%% telling me to watch what i click, reddit community is utterly %%%%ed don't know why i even bothered going there.
